## NS.vsprintf() method

Format a string with an array of arguments.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
vsprintf(format: string, args: any[]): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  format | string | String to format. |
|  args | any\[\] | Formating arguments. |

<b>Returns:</b>

string

Formated text.
